description.value:
You gain a +2 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this magic weapon.

The sword has [[/r 1d8 + 1]] charges. If you score a critical hit against a creature that has fewer than 100 HP, it must succeed on a [[/save 15 CON]] or be slain instantly as the sword tears its life force from its body (a Construct or an Undead is immune). The sword loses 1 charge if the creature is slain. When the sword has no charges remaining, it loses this property.

Foundry Note

Weapon (Any Sword), Very Rare, 8,800 gp (Requires Attunement)

Create the final magic item by selection the appropriate mundane item and dragging an enchantment from the Advancement & Effects tab to that item.
